title: The Future Sound of London - Complete Radio Broadcasts [MP3]
description:
Part 4 of a 4 part series compiling the works of Brian Dougans and Garry Cobain, known to most as the Future Sound of London. This torrent contains the various radio programs the duo broadcast on radio stations including Kiss FM, BBC Radio 1, and their own live events.

These shows (bootlegs?) were never released on CD and therefore only exist in MP3 format.

BBC Radio 1 Essential Mixes
Two mixes, two hours each, of the duo's finest tracks.

The Collected Electric Brain Storms
12 hours of mixes of tracks both by the duo and other artists.

The Collected ISDN Live Transmissions
Over 16 hours of material from the ISDN tour.

The Collected Kiss FM Transmissions
23 hours (!!!) of shows broadcast on Kiss FM throughout the band's career.

The Collected Monstrous Psychedelic Broadcasts
Nearly  12 hours of a broad spectrum of psychedelic music, normally mixed under the Amorphous Androgynous moniker.

That's roughly 67 hours of pure, unadulterated Dougans & Cobain as both mixers and producers. Enjoy and seed!!!
